page.title: 15A Killamarsh Policeman
page.content: A local policeman came into school recently to show us a film called "Don't talk to strangers".While he was in school we asked him a few questions.We found out that his name is Stephen Dutton.He is 35 years old and he lives in Killamarsh.He is married and has three children their names are Tracey,Joanne and Robert. He is in the police constable rank. He has been a policeman ten and a half years.He works in Killamarsh and likes his job and the uniform.He has made a lot of arrests.He has worked in Shirebrook and Bolsover aswell as in Killamarsh.In Killamarsh he has to look out for strange men or women that are asking children to come with them. He has to look out for murderers and burglars.
